mapper.select: select member_id as 'memberId', consume_total as 'consumeTotal', consume_discount as 'consumeDiscount', consume_date as 'consumeDate', del_flag as 'delFlag' from consumeRecord
mapper.insert: insert into worker ( username, password, gender, phone, address, worker_type, del_flag )values( #{username}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{workerType}, '0' )
mapper.update: update worker set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, phone = #{phone}, gender = #{gender}, address = #{address}, worker_type = #{workerType} where id = #{id}
